Class Homework

java.lang.Object
model.Homework
public class Homework extends Object
Represents a homework assignment in the school management system.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Homework

      public Homework(Date assignmentDate, Date dueDate, int classId, String description, boolean status)
      Constructor for creating a new homework record.
      Parameters:
      assignmentDate - The date the homework was assigned
      dueDate - The due date for the homework
      classId - The ID of the class the homework is for
      description - A description of the homework
      status - The status of the homework (true = completed, false = not completed)

    • Homework

      public Homework(int homeworkId, Date assignmentDate, Date dueDate, int classId, String description, boolean status)
      Constructor for existing homework records.
      Parameters:
      homeworkId - The unique ID of the homework
      assignmentDate - The date the homework was assigned
      dueDate - The due date for the homework
      classId - The ID of the class the homework is for
      description - A description of the homework
      status - The status of the homework (true = completed, false = not completed)

      public boolean isCompleted()
      Checks if this homework is completed.
      Returns:
      true if the homework is completed, false otherwise

    • isOverdue

      public boolean isOverdue()
      Checks if this homework is overdue.
      Returns:
      true if the due date has passed and the homework is not completed, false otherwise
